code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{db}from"../firebase";import{collection,getDocs}from"firebase/firestore";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const[units,setUnits]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchUnits=async()=>{const querySnapshot=await getDocs(collection(db,"swappy_units"));setUnits(querySnapshot.docs.map(doc=>({id:doc.id,...doc.data()})));};fetchUnits();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Swappy Units"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate("/create-unit"),className:"bg-green-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded mb-4",children:"Create Swappy Unit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:units.map(unit=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"p-4 border rounded my-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-lg font-bold",children:unit.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:unit.location})]},unit.id))})]});};export default Dashboard;
